entry.title: Howdy!
entry.summary: Hey there folks, nice to meet y'all! Inspired by my friend ari…
entry.content:
Hey there folks, nice to meet y'all!

Inspired by my friend ari - I am giving this blogging thing a chance. The state of social media frankly pisses me the fuck off. Twitter is a Nazi hellscape, Bluesky is ok I guess and I'll probably stick around there too, but nobody can stop me here so I get to make it a cool place the way I want it.

Who knows what I'll post about? It will likely just be mundane things about my life; hobbies, cool things I see or do, and probably some tech and game dev stuff when I find the time for it.

So come hang out and learn more about me! ðŸ’–ðŸŒ¿
